item.title: Fresh Air Photo
item.body: This is a cool wordpress blog made for Fresh Air Photo, an awesome photography company located in Johnson City, TN.  This site uses a customized Wordpress theme and a was collaboration between Trevcor Dev and designer Jeremy Pass.

image.title: Fresh Air Photo Home Page
image.caption: This a screenshot of the subpages for the site.

image.title: Fresh Air Photo Home Page
image.caption: This a screenshot of the subpages for the site.

item.message: Check out the full site: Fresh Air Photo

item.title: Coca-Cola Sports & Entertainment Toolkit
item.body: This was a quick prototype I made for an internal Coca-Cola team.  It is a portal that organizes access to documents and other assets managed through Microsoft Sharepoint.

image.title: Sports & Entertainment Asset Toolkit Portal
image.caption: This a screenshot of the home page.

image.title: Sports & Entertainment Asset Toolkit Portal
image.caption: This a screenshot of the subpages for the site.

item.title: Coca-Cola Food & Beverages Services
item.body: Another prototype I made for Coca-Cola corporate cafeterias.  It is a nice clean looking site that was built to tap into a sharepoint backend to load in weekly menu data.
